faq.question: Is it really free?
faq.answer: Yes! You get 10 free image upscaling credits every month, no credit card required. These credits renew monthly.

faq.question: Will there be watermarks on my images?
faq.answer: Never. All images you create with MyImageUpscaler are completely watermark-free, even on the free tier.

faq.question: What happens when I run out of free credits?
faq.answer: You can upgrade to a premium plan for unlimited credits, or wait until next month when your free credits renew.

pages.h1: Free Photo Enhancer - AI-Powered Photo Enhancement
pages.intro: Transform your photos with professional AI enhancement. Fix blur, optimize colors, and enhance details—all for free with no watermarks.
pages.description: Bring your photos to life with AI-powered enhancement. Our free tier provides 10 monthly enhancements with the same professional-grade technology trusted by photographers worldwide.

features.title: Automatic Enhancement
features.description: AI analyzes and enhances your photos automatically. No sliders, no settings—just perfect results.

features.title: Color Correction
features.description: Fix white balance, saturation, and vibrancy issues automatically for natural-looking results.

features.title: Detail Sharpening
features.description: Enhance fine details and textures while keeping skin tones smooth and natural.

features.title: Noise Reduction
features.description: Eliminate grain from low-light or high-ISO photos without losing important detail.

faq.question: How is this different from the free image upscaler?
faq.answer: The photo enhancer focuses on improving quality (color, sharpness, noise) rather than increasing size. It's perfect for fixing photo quality issues.

faq.question: Can I use this for old family photos?
faq.answer: Absolutely! The AI is excellent at restoring and enhancing old, faded, or damaged photos to bring them back to life.

faq.question: Do I need to create an account?
faq.answer: No account needed for the free tier. Just visit the site and start enhancing. Create an account only if you want to track your usage or upgrade.

pages.description: Professional image enhancement without the professional price tag. Get 10 free enhancements monthly with enterprise-grade AI that rivals Photoshop's results.

features.title: One-Click Enhancement
features.description: Upload and enhance with a single click. AI handles all the complex adjustments automatically.

features.title: Quality Improvement
features.description: Enhance overall image quality by fixing compression artifacts, blur, and low resolution issues.

features.title: Smart Detail Recovery
features.description: AI intelligently recovers lost details and textures that were degraded by compression or downsizing.

features.title: Format Flexibility
features.description: Upload JPEG, PNG, or WebP. Download in any format you need, with optimal compression settings.

faq.question: What's the difference between enhancement and upscaling?
faq.answer: Enhancement improves existing quality (sharpness, color, detail) while upscaling increases the size/resolution. Both can be used together for best results.

faq.question: Will this fix blurry images?
faq.answer: The AI can significantly improve mild to moderate blur, especially from compression or slight motion. Extreme blur has physical limits to what can be recovered.

faq.question: How many times can I enhance the same image?
faq.answer: Each enhancement uses one credit. You can enhance the same image multiple times if you want to experiment with different settings (on premium plans).

faq.question: How does AI enhancement differ from regular filters?
faq.answer: AI analyzes your specific photo and makes intelligent adjustments based on content. Filters just apply preset changes blindly to any image.

faq.question: Can I use this for professional photography?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Many professional photographers use AI enhancement as part of their workflow. The free tier is perfect for testing before upgrading.

faq.question: Does it work on selfies and portraits?
faq.answer: Yes, the AI is specially optimized for portraits with skin smoothing, face detection, and natural-looking enhancements that preserve authenticity.

pages.intro: Upscale your images to 4K resolution using advanced AI. Get 10 free upscales every month with the same technology used by professionals.
pages.description: Transform low-resolution images into high-quality visuals with neural network upscaling. Our free tier offers genuine AI upscaling, not simple interpolation.

features.title: True AI Upscaling
features.description: Neural networks intelligently generate new pixels instead of simple interpolation for superior quality.

features.title: Up to 4X Upscaling

upgradePoints: Up to 8x upscaling (vs 4x on free tier)
Batch processing up to 50 images simultaneously

faq.question: What's the difference between AI upscaling and regular upscaling?
faq.answer: Regular upscaling (interpolation) just stretches pixels. AI upscaling uses neural networks to intelligently generate new detail that looks natural and sharp.

faq.question: Can I upscale images beyond 4x on free tier?
faq.answer: The free tier supports up to 4x upscaling. For 8x upscaling and larger outputs, upgrade to a premium plan.

faq.question: How long does AI upscaling take?
faq.answer: Typically 30-60 seconds for standard images on the free tier. Premium users get priority processing in 10-20 seconds.

pages.h1: Free Background Remover - Remove Backgrounds Instantly
pages.intro: Remove backgrounds from any image completely free. Our AI processes images in your browser for instant results with no limits and no watermarks.
pages.description: Professional background removal at zero cost. Our AI model runs entirely in your browser, so there are no usage limits, no watermarks, and your images never leave your device.

features.title: Unlimited Free Use
features.description: No credits, no limits. Remove backgrounds from as many images as you want, completely free.

features.title: No Watermarks Ever
features.description: Download clean images with transparent backgrounds. No logos, no watermarks, no branding.

features.title: 100% Private
features.description: Processing happens in your browser. Your images never upload to any server.

features.title: AI-Powered Precision
features.description: Advanced neural networks detect subjects and handle complex edges like hair and fur.

limitations: Processing speed depends on your device
Very large images may be slower on mobile devices
Requires modern browser with WebAssembly support

faq.question: Is this really unlimited and free?
faq.answer: Yes! Because the AI runs in your browser, there are no server costs per image. Use it as much as you want with no limits, no signup, and no watermarks.

faq.question: Why is it free when others charge?
faq.answer: Traditional background removers process images on their servers, which costs money. Our tool uses WebAssembly to run the AI model directly in your browser, eliminating server costs.

faq.question: Are my images private?
faq.answer: Completely. Your images are processed locally on your device and never uploaded anywhere. We cannot see or access your images.

faq.question: What browsers are supported?
faq.answer: Any modern browser with WebAssembly support works: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Mobile browsers are supported but may be slower on older devices.
